items.sentence: Tom doesn't seem to be as passionate about that as Mary seems to be.
Tom grabbed the snow shovel and went outside to shovel the sidewalk.
My house is on your left as you go up the street towards the church.
Our ancestors developed massive jaws as a result of constant combat.
My son practices with his Little League baseball team every weekend.
Parents who work at home get to spend more time with their children.
I spent a few minutes talking to the man at the information counter.
Tom got rid of the bloody knife and washed his hands very carefully.
The party in power is corrupt, but the opposition isn't much better.
I don't think that Tom knows why Mary doesn't like living in Boston.
Someday I hope that I can speak French as well as you speak English.
Tom didn't seem to care that Mary didn't do what he asked her to do.
Tom realized that he didn't have enough money to buy what he needed.
I don't think that you need to tell Tom what Mary is planning to do.
I don't think that Tom knows for certain when Mary will be arriving.
Everybody seemed to already know Tom and Mary were getting divorced.
Tom wants Mary to know he isn't planning on asking her to marry him.
I think it's very, very unlikely that Tom knows Mary's phone number.
There were many things that needed to be done before we could leave.
If you're not busy next weekend, why don't you come fishing with me?
